properties.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Eastern Clinton; Western Clinton; Northern St. Lawrence
properties.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 10 at 3:38PM EST until January 12 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington VT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy freezing rain with significant icing expected. Total
ice accumulations of a half inch to one inch expected, with the
highest amounts expected in the Saint Lawrence Valley of New
York.

* WHERE...Northern and western St. Lawrence, Clinton, and northern
Franklin Counties in New York.

* WHEN...Freezing rain is expected Saturday night into Sunday
morning, and will be moderate to heavy at times. There may be
some sleet mixed in early Saturday night, becoming primarily
freezing rain as the night goes on. Precipitation will end as a
brief period of snow Sunday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Expect power outages and tree damage due to the ice.
Travel could be very difficult Saturday night into Sunday owing
to icy roads.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty southwest winds 25 to 35 mph will
develop Sunday afternoon, which will could have an impact on
any ice laden trees and powerlines.
properties.instruction:
Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. Prepare for
extended power outages.

Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

NWSheadline: ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM SATURDAY TO 1 PM EST SUNDAY
